CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1957, pg. 1 reads: " Pittsburghers in ABA - Among the Pittsburghers taking part in ABA tournament who won points are, seated: Betty Alexander and Ruby Willingham; standing, George Wilson, Henry Lindsay, Daisy Goodman, Lucille Hayes, Rose Milton, W.P. Young and Thomas S. Ruffin - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bridge tournament players, from left, seated: Betty Alexander and Ruby Willingham; standing: George Wilson, Henry Lindsay, Daisy Goodman, Lucille Hayes, Rose Milton, W. P. Young, and Thomas S. Ruffin, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel during the twenty-fourth annual American Bridge Association tournament
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Young, William P.Milton, Rose.Fort Pitt Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
